https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to determine this relation.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.label: Criteria
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/crite.name: criteria

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inRel._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inRel.label: In relation to
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inRel.name: inRelationTo

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/quali._instruction: Add the qualitative overlap that best describes the relation between the two anatomical entities.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/quali.description: Semantic characterization of how much two things occupy the same space.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/quali.label: Qualitative overlap
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/quali.name: qualitativeOverlap
